data.actual_result: You are not disconect and you go back to the main menu (While keeping Deafen/Mute)
data.expected_result: You will be disconect and went back to your main menu
data.short_description: Cannot Leave a voice channel while you get Deafen or mute
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a voice channel - Tap on Deafen or Mute button - Tap on your disconect to voice (Do the 2 ''Tap Button'' Steps very quickly)
